channel.title: CVE Feed for NETGEAR -- XR1000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NETGEAR -- XR1000

item.title: CVE-2021-34870|2024-08-04T00:26:54.590Z -- netgear -- xr1000
item.description: This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of NETGEAR XR1000 1.0.0.52_1.0.38 routers. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the processing of SOAP messages. The issue results from a lack of authentication required for a privileged request. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose stored credentials, leading to further compromise. Was ZDI-CAN-13325.
